p: A randomized controlled trial was carried out on adult patients waiting for dental treatment to evaluate the anxiolytic effects of Citrus sinensis. Orange odor was diffused in the waiting room of odor group through an electrical dispenser whereas in the control group no odor was diffused. For assessing cognitive functions, patients completed the Wortschatz test (WST) [ 60]. For assessing trait and state anxiety, patients were given the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) [ 61]. The Mehrdimensionale Befindlichkeitsfragebogen (MDBF) [ 62] were used for assessment of current mood, alertness, and calmness.
